display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
display_long_description_unprocessed:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=CrNMU9-VoEYQ7kNvwHn7VqT&_nc_oc=AdnmxXKeZw8lI5tGhZNb7CKNEhEfhZzgFu84aLGcsXxTRiuGcyQBJ6v_jq2MNkxLzcQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=IqIicx8xNQc9QN2Ozrgsbg&oh=00_AfJWkoKOx5bIuLgl8wwtkqudGTzjq9C2cvNXlzibWqgDuQ&oe=683439DD)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Seb742Q4UlcQ7kNvwEIUIst&_nc_oc=AdmosrCGyeoknft_F3eVJ5cBtsKoTsk5Ysb3Hnqt9SFoOxvl1vw-d_5zE5lxmJHbI38&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=IqIicx8xNQc9QN2Ozrgsbg&oh=00_AfIOB0SWxmLryskG25SBwaRZvYKQLoBWfhBTAZHJ00q5Iw&oe=68341B92)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=imWm8XWtXyAQ7kNvwExi_A_&_nc_oc=AdkSdfgwkV7Jc6C6JOBLHtnyOKMGpOe4wK3mQFWWDVq_w0-GgHHHgXVed7mpe1EonZE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=IqIicx8xNQc9QN2Ozrgsbg&oh=00_AfJRmAHhVCfOaiz1ppI7MF2Lp1L-kKWX-6ps0H59j_0lsg&oe=683421A3)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=S9or_OI-pF4Q7kNvwEBmXuR&_nc_oc=AdmhSxHJLiZlIABGIr9T-KLNqXPaeEI3HGn3zM1xADvdMesmHkWFPwLRkgPuBxuwAyQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=IqIicx8xNQc9QN2Ozrgsbg&oh=00_AfIibajpHJY-ENd5MPpx-xhe6f874jQVglt1CXM0OnvrtA&oe=6834506E)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=gbGAUa5wQPIQ7kNvwGeVEqW&_nc_oc=AdnQS4juoWA1fKT9JVYud6dVvnvZo2kbgdAOQy5LTIfCTL1CnwIXzDkc810f-gnXay0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=IqIicx8xNQc9QN2Ozrgsbg&oh=00_AfKnl06QUpiqDi22bTcWVSqXy_OZKP6VKB1m5TX9F3mGoA&oe=68342016)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
